text: Michael Heseltine says it is for the young people that we must have another vote on Brexit.

text: Bercow ruling at first sight would seem to mean we have to ask for (and accept) a long extension or leave without a deal. Both options will appal most Tory MPs.
author: tobyhelm

text: There are Leave marches happening yes, separate to the Farage one which will be stuck in the Midlands somewhere!

text: Country divided. Parliament divided. Parties divided. Families divided. Britain split over prospect of second Brexit vote, poll finds

text: At last Labour to go for it. But is it too late? Or too early? Brexit: Labour set to endorse a plan to put May’s deal to a public vote

text:
Last Sunday BBC main news story was May appeals for MPs to back her.
This Sunday. Same. Next Sunday. Same?
author: tobyhelm
